name: Dominoes Colors
description:
Dominoes Colors


It is a puzzle relaxing game with 30 stages.You need to mix colors when put each piece on board. The mix result is the next step to solve the puzzle. The piece with a chequered flag is the last piece, your last mix of colors needs to be equal of it.

Colors


The game contains 16 different colors, explore your knowledge about colors to discover what will be the next mix result. The "white piece" and "black piece" are special colors, try any kind of combinations with these pieces to identify theirs secrets.

Pieces


Each piece has its own "color side" and "blank side", the blank side will be another color after the colored piece side in your "hand" combine with a colored piece in "board".

Win Condition


The last piece is signaled by a chequered flag, to win you must combine the colors gradually until arrives the last piece.

Coins and Stars


When you finish a stage you will be rewarded with coins and stars according with the quantities of pieces utilized, so if you discovered new ways to complete the same stage, return and unlock all your rewards.

Obstacles and Powerups


According your advance in game, you will notice some obstacles, each one has its own behaviour and complexity. But to help and ease your path, you will can buy powerups with the coins earned in each stage.
